Key Match Events: Gerardo Arteaga scored a belter of an effort from the edge of the box to secure a 1-0 victory for Mexico
Pre-Game Insights: Mexico were undergoing a rebuild of sorts, but at the same time, they knew that Copa America 2024 was their chance to prove to the world that they are among the game's elite and one of the best in CONCACAF
Post-Match Reflections: Losing Edson Alvarez to a hamstring injury early in the first half was a terrible blow for Mexico, and this sort of performance won't be enough throughout the tournament if they want to make any sort of run
Others: Jamaica initially scored only to see it called back for an offsides on Michail Antonio in the 50th minute
